- Create a tibble for {Sonja, Steven, Ines, Robert, Tim} with their heights {164, 188, 164, 180, 170} 
and weights {56.0, 87.0, 54.0, 80.0, 58.5}.

```{r} 
t <- tibble(name=c("Sonja" , "Steven", "Ines", "Robert", "Tim" ),
       height=c(164, 188, 164, 180, 170),  
       weight=c(56.0, 87.0, 54.0, 80.0, 58.5))  
t
```
